page.title: 01Review of South Bradford.
page.content: Our 12 kilometre square is situated to the south of the{City of Bradford.}The area can be divided into two by a line following the A6036 from West to East across the "block".The northern half is situated on a north facing slope looking across the City of Bradford. This part of area is occupied mainly by residential property of various types and light industry. The southern half of the "block" is situated on a south facing slope and consists mainly of residential property, farmland and two golf courses. The M606, which runs in a southerly direction from the A6036, is Bradford's only link with the national{Motorway system}via the M62. The A6030 forms part of the Bradford Ring Road and two other important roads pass through our area going to{Wakefield, Halifax and} {Huddersfield.Block Population 40,000}
